issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is a duplicate of an existing issue.
resolution.name: Duplicate

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description: Buttons on Android devices do not appear to darken when pressed, which should match functionality from the iOS side.

comments.body:
Please provide details and screenshots.

We need:
1. Ti SDK version number
2. Android OS version number
3. If device, we need make and model
4. If emulator, version number
5. Most importantly, code. Single app.js file to reproduce
6. Screenshot if available.
